thorwin.math

Interface Cholesky

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface Cholesky
extends java.io.Serializable
    Cholesky decomposition.
    See Also:
    Wikipedia on the Cholesky Decomposition

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Matrix getL()
      Returns the triangular factor (left).
      Matrix getR()
      Returns the triangular factor (right).
      boolean hasL()
      Checks if the decomposition calculated matrix L.
      boolean hasR()
      Checks if the decomposition calculated matrix R.
      java.util.Optional<Matrix> solve(Matrix matrix)
      Solve X for A×X = B.

    • Method Detail

      • getL

        Matrix getL()
        Returns the triangular factor (left).
        Returns:
        L

      • getR

        Matrix getR()
        Returns the triangular factor (right).
        Returns:
        R

      • hasL

        boolean hasL()
        Checks if the decomposition calculated matrix L. The method getL will return R' if L was not calculated.
        Returns:
        True if the decomposition has calculated L

      • hasR

        boolean hasR()
        Checks if the decomposition calculated matrix R. The method getL will return L' if R was not calculated.
        Returns:
        True if the decomposition has calculated R

      • solve

        java.util.Optional<Matrix> solve(Matrix matrix)
        Solve X for A×X = B. Will return X so that L×L′×X = B.
        Parameters:
        matrix - a matrix with as many rows as A and any number of columns
        Returns:
        the solution matrix, if any
